name: Edguru Search
description: Telegram's sassiest group utility bot. Modular Telegram group management bot!

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable env variables

TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode messages

URL.description: The Heroku App URL similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks

DEL_CMDS.description: Whether to delete commands from users which don't have rights to use that command

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Whether to allow using exclamation marks ! for commands as well as /.
